title: Kubernetes Multi-Cluster Management Platform
description: A comprehensive platform for managing multiple Kubernetes clusters across different cloud providers with centralized monitoring, policy enforcement, and automated scaling.

title: Terraform AWS Infrastructure Templates
description: Production-ready Terraform modules for AWS infrastructure including VPC, EKS, RDS, and monitoring setup with best practices and security compliance.

title: CI/CD Pipeline Automation Suite
description: Comprehensive CI/CD automation using GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, and Jenkins with support for multiple languages, testing frameworks, and deployment strategies.

title: Monitoring and Observability Stack
description: Complete monitoring solution with Prometheus, Grafana, Jaeger, and ELK stack for comprehensive application and infrastructure observability.

title: AWS EKS Security Hardening
description: Security hardening scripts and policies for AWS EKS clusters including pod security policies, network policies, and RBAC configurations.

title: Container Registry Management Tool
description: Tool for managing multiple container registries (Docker Hub, AWS ECR, GCR) with automated vulnerability scanning and cleanup policies.

title: Infrastructure Cost Optimization Dashboard
description: Real-time dashboard for tracking and optimizing cloud infrastructure costs across AWS, GCP, and Azure with automated recommendations.

title: GitOps Workflow Automation
description: Complete GitOps implementation using ArgoCD, Flux, and custom operators for automated deployment and configuration management.
